mapper.insert: insert into review(title, content, userId, productId) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId},#{productId})
mapper.select: select r.id,r.productId,r.title,u.username,r.createDate from review r inner join user u on r.userId = u.id where r.id = #{reviewId}
select r.id,r.productId,r.title,u.username,r.createDate from review r inner join user u on r.userId = u.id
